QAPair.Question: What is (are) Managing latex allergies at home ?
QAPair.Answer: If you have a latex allergy, your skin or mucous membranes (eyes, mouth, nose, or other moist areas) react when latex touches them. A severe latex allergy can affect breathing and cause other serious problems. Latex is made from the sap of rubber trees. It is very strong and stretchy. So it is used in a lot of common household items and toys.
